actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to extend the Generalized System of Preferences.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to extend the Generalized System of Preferences for duty-free treatment of imports from September 30, 2001, through December 31, 2005.Provides for retroactive application of duty-free treatment for certain liquidations and reliquidations of entries after September 30, 2001, but before the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to extend the Generalized System of Preferences.
